title: One night stand
creator_credit: Astra Film Productions, Richard Mason, Simon Wincer and John Duigan
brief_description: On the eve of World war three a group of young people find themselves in the deserted Sydney Opera House. As they hear that war has broken out in Europe and heads for Australia, the four spend what may be their last New Year’s Eve amusing themselves and growing closer in friendship. Cast: Tyler Coppin, Cassandra Delaney, Jay Hackett, Saskia Post, Midnight Oil.
